Episodes.Title: Episode 1
Episodes.Plot: Luther investigates a the case of a fetishist who is murdering women which is similar to an unsolved case from the 1980s. The team attempt to catch the copycat killer, whose murderous spree has only just started.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: Episode 2
Episodes.Plot: Luther's date with Mary, and the promise of romance, is interrupted by the news of another murder. The killer has struck again - the number of victims is escalating fast.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual themes and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: Episode 3
Episodes.Plot: In what looks like a gangland crime - two hoodies are shot at close range. But an un-connected crime sees Luther make a un-connected connection that might provide the real answer to what happened.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence and content that may disturb

Episodes.Title: Episode 4
Episodes.Plot: Marwood makes his vendetta personal - targeting Luther and those closest to him, raining destruction on everything he touches. Stark and Gray arrive just in time to hurry Mary to a secret place, but is her safety really Stark's priority, or is she just a pawn in his game to lure Luther to him?
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence and content that may disturb
